title: PDF and Image RAG (Retrieve and Generate) using Google Gemini

overview.description: A Retrieve and Generate (RAG) system utilizing Google Gemini for PDF and image interactions
overview.details: Developed a Retrieve and Generate (RAG) system powered by Google Gemini, enabling users to query and interact with the content of uploaded PDFs and images. The system incorporates advanced image recognition to extract relevant information from images and generate contextually accurate responses, enhancing user engagement and information retrieval.

features: Interactive querying and conversation with document content via chat interface
Image recognition technology to extract information from uploaded images
Context-aware responses generated from both PDFs and images
Seamless user experience for both text and image-based queries
Integration of Google Gemini API for intelligent dialogue management and processing
